answers.answer: It's time for a checkup with a urologist.  Have your prostate checked and mention your change in semen volume and decrease in erectile function.  You will be checked for diabetes, maybe thyroid disease, and maybe to see if you have retrograde ejaculation.  These are all important tests for conditions very common in your age group, and often changes in erections are the first signs of trouble.
Thx, have been to the Doc, thyroid ok, sugar good. PSA levels normal. Yet the problem has got worse . ?????

Hi Laz, This could be your PC muscle, its the same muscle that us men use to stop urinating its got weak, you need to try kegels, its a simple exercise that should help, just google pegym, and on there look for the beginners page for kegels.Good Luck

question: I am 54 and get normal erections when aroused. Lately I have noticed a loss in the ammount of fluid released and trying to address that is with supplements and hydration. The other problem is that lately during foreplay I will dribble some precum and my erection will immediately go down. Almost as if I have had an orgasm..Any ideas on the cause of the problem?lazj
title: Losing erection mid flight
